main event: Two round, brilliant silver colored objects were observed in San Antonio, Texas, trailing an orange flame while ascending vertically and flying horizontally.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 seconds,The objects were not in formation,There was no sound associated with the objects,The observers reported seeing a flame trailing an object,The sighting occurred in a populated area but no other witnesses were noted.
sighted object: two round, brilliant silver colored objects with orange flame
witness description: Observers were civilians indicating an age of around 43.
